overview: Adam has experienced a lot in his life, but he's still waiting for great love. He dreams of a passionate lover who will fulfill all his desires. His ex-wife always believed that a bed was only for sleeping. Adam hopes that there is a woman out there who will change his life. And he is not mistaken: a beautiful woman named Ma≈Çgorzata appears on the horizon - a tigress in the guise of a modest teacher, who introduces him to the world of true passion. Blinded by love, they forget about the rest of the world. However, their relationship faces difficult moments as well - their personalities are as compatible as oil and water, and the reality of Polish life puts their love to many tests. Can their romance survive?
title: Ajlawju
